name: Classic Burger
description: Our Classic Burger is made with a juicy beef patty, topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, tomato, and our signature sauce. Served on a toasted sesame seed bun, this burger is a timeless favorite that never disappoints. Try it today!

name: BBQ Bacon Burger
description: Our BBQ Bacon Burger is a mouth-watering delight that combines smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, and melted Swiss cheese with a juicy beef patty. Topped with lettuce, tomato, and onion, this burger is a perfect balance of sweet and savory. Served on a brioche bun, it's a must-try for any burger lover!

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Our Mushroom Swiss Burger is a rich and flavorful burger that features sautéed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, and our special sauce. The juicy beef patty is cooked to perfection and served on a toasted Kaiser bun. This burger is a favorite among mushroom lovers!

name: Double Cheeseburger
description: Our Double Cheeseburger is a cheese-lover's dream come true! Two juicy beef patties are stacked high with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles. Served on a sesame seed bun, this burger is a true classic that's perfect for any occasion.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Our Veggie Burger is a healthy and delicious alternative to traditional burgers. Made with a plant-based patty, this burger is topped with fresh lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce. Served on a whole wheat bun, it's a guilt-free meal that's perfect for vegetarians and meat-lovers alike!

name: Jalapeño Burger
description: Our Veggie Burger is a healthy and delicious alternative to traditional burgers. Made with a plant-based patty, tomato, onion, and our special sauce. Served on a whole wheat bun, it's a guilt-free meal that's perfect for vegetarians and meat-lovers alike!
